alert.note: Alert for Logan; Marshall; Mason; McLean; Tazewell; Woodford (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 24 at 10:26AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Marshall, northwestern Logan, Woodford, Tazewell, west central McLean and east central Mason Counties through 1100 AM CDT... At 1025 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Chillicothe to near Mason City. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Washburn around 1035 AM CDT. Delavan, Emden and Varna around 1040 AM CDT. Toluca around 1045 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Hopedale, Wenona, Armington, Mackinaw, Minier, Danvers and Stanford. This includes the following highways... Interstate 155 between mile markers 8 and 31. Interstate 39 between mile markers 23 and 40. Interstate 474 between mile markers 12 and 14. Interstate 74 between mile markers 97 and 119. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Logan; Marshall; Mason; McLean; Tazewell; Woodford
